Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Upgrade Firecrawl API from v1 to v2 format

- Update endpoint: v1/extract -> v2/extract
- Update request body: url -> urls \(array format\)
- Add response logging for debugging

Note: v2 API returns async job IDs instead of immediate results.
Polling implementation needed for production use.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(gh pr edit 10 --title "Add local dev improvements and upgrade Firecrawl to v2" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Improve local development setup with npx supabase workflow
- Add comprehensive request logging to Edge Function
- Upgrade Firecrawl API from v1 to v2 format

## Changes

### Local Development Setup
- Updated `scripts/dev-backend.sh` to use `npx supabase` instead of global CLI
- Reorganized env files: `frontend/.env.example` and `supabase/.env.example`
- Added `supabase/.gitignore` for local env files
- Added `supabase/config.toml` with JWT verification disabled for local testing
- Improved `dev-backend.sh` with line-buffered output and `[backend]` prefix
- Updated README.md with npx workflow instructions

### Request Logging
- Add comprehensive request logging to Edge Function handler
- Log Firecrawl API request/response details for debugging

### Firecrawl API v2 Upgrade
- **Endpoint**: Changed from `/v1/extract` to `/v2/extract`
- **Request format**: Changed from `url` \(string\) to `urls` \(array\)
- **Response logging**: Added to track API responses
- **Note**: v2 API returns async job IDs instead of immediate results. Polling implementation needed for production use.

## Testing
- Tested local dev environment startup
- Verified Firecrawl v2 API call succeeds \(200 OK\) vs previous v1 format error \(400 Bad Request\)
- Confirmed request/response logging works

## Known Limitations
- Firecrawl v2 uses async job processing - current implementation doesn''t poll for results yet
- Job polling needs to be implemented to retrieve actual extracted events

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")

Bash(gh issue create --title "Add crawl job table and pending events/places management UI" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
Add a comprehensive UI for managing crawl jobs and reviewing pending events/places before they are published.

## Feature Requirements

### 1. Crawl Job Table
- Display all crawl jobs in a table view
- Show relevant job information \(status, URL, created date, etc.\)
- Add filtering capabilities:
  - Filter by status \(pending, running, completed, failed\)
  - Filter by date range
  - Search by URL or job ID

### 2. Pending Events & Places Tab
Create a separate tab/section for managing pending events and places:

#### List View
- Display pending events and places in a list format
- Show key information \(name, source, status, created date\)
- Support filtering and sorting
- Allow bulk actions \(approve, reject, delete\)

#### Detail/Edit View
- View full details of a pending event or place
- Edit fields before approval
- Preview how the event/place will appear when published
- Actions: Approve, Reject, Save Changes, Delete

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Crawl job table with filtering
- [ ] Pending events list view
- [ ] Pending places list view
- [ ] Detail/edit view for pending events
- [ ] Detail/edit view for pending places
- [ ] Navigation between list and detail views

## Technical Notes
- Should integrate with existing Supabase backend
- Consider pagination for large datasets
- Maintain consistent UI/UX with existing components
EOF
\)")
